title.rendered: Roomi vs Livewith: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder

content.rendered:
There are many things to consider when moving to a new city, and one of them is housing and roommates. Thanks to today’s technology, plenty of roommate finder apps and websites are available to use. However, they are not all reliable. As much as Craiglist is a popular choice for people looking to find roommates, there are risks associated with using this site. It’s important to use a dependable roommate finder app or website. Just remember to always take precautions before giving out your personal information, wherever you’re looking.

This blog is designed to help you figure out how to find roommates using roommate finder apps – and to tell you which is the best website to find roommates on as well. We’ll be comparing two roommate finder apps, Roomi and LiveWith, to help you on your journey to find the best roommate!

Pricing: Are these roommate finder apps free or paid?

LiveWith is a free app, but it’s only available for Apple users. It offers three subscriptions to its users: Starter Plan, Gold Plan, and Platinum Plan. The Starter Plan is free and lets you post up to two listings. The Gold Plan provides you with 18 listings, while the Platinum Plan has over 200 listings.

Roomi, on the other hand, is free to download from both the App Store and the Google Play Store. With their free plan, you get five swipes a day on mobile, plus five private messages, and you can activate two listings daily. Roomi also offers a paid subscription plan with exclusive benefits. Get a weekly($14.99) or monthly $29.99) subscription to Roomi Gold and unlock unlimited messages and swipes, a Fully Verified status on your profile, and boost your profile to boot!

Security: Can these apps help me find roommates I can trust?

Your safety and security have got to be your top priority when moving to a new city. So, finding the roommate you feel safe with is super important! And when you’re using roommate finder apps, it’s important to see that their users are verified or that the app offers criminal background checks and ID verifications. With these features, you will definitely find safe roomies to live with!

Verifies Roommate Contact Info

There are two options when creating a LiveWith account; you can either log in via Facebook or use your email address to sign up. It sounds simple, but some LiveWith reviews say that the sign-up process doesn’t work, so you might find yourself unable to make an account. As an alternative of LiveWith, Roomi uses GlobalID, a digital identity platform that confirms a user’s email and contact information and keeps their data safe and secure.

ID Verification

It’s common knowledge that not everyone on the internet is who they say they are. However, Roomi makes sure that the user profiles on their roommate finder app have been made by real people by using a thorough verification process. Additionally, Roomi Gold can give you a Fully Verified status on your profile. But even without the subscription, all users undergo verification before being able to use the app to ensure everyone’s safety.

Privacy & security of profiles

On LiveWith, your basic information like ID, name, photo, gender, and location is available to the public. Moreover, they give you the option to share more of your data with potential matches. However, in Roomi, your personal information is protected under GDPR, which means you can request for your data to be removed once you’ve found a roomie. Moreover, Roomi features secure in-app messaging that keeps your messages safe. You don’t have to worry about your private information being leaked, as Roomi, the best alternative of LiveWith, keeps it safe and secure within the app.

24/7 Support & Content Moderation

Roomi, the alternative of LiveWith, has an in-house content moderation team who are responsible for filtering out bad listings and removing spam content. LiveWith also makes sure that the users posting listings on their roommate finder app are real people.

Criminal Background Check

Roomi can do background checks against criminal databases upon request. The user will be prompted to submit a photo of their ID, and if there aren’t any discrepancies, a verified badge would be shown on their profile, increasing their chances of finding the perfect roommate. Additionally, with a Roomi Gold subscription, you can get a verified badge yourself!

User Profiles: Which App Make it Easier to Find Your Perfect Roommate?

Roomi has a simple and easy-to-navigate app and website, so finding roommates is a breeze for its users. As a roommate finder, Roomi uses a roommate matching algorithm that finds you users to match with based on the many preferences and filters available. You can apply filters to narrow down your choices and find exactly what you’re looking for. If you want to find a roommate who’s younger or older than you, or an LGBTQ+ friendly roommate, it’s all possible with Roomi! Just make sure to set your preferences just so, so the roommate matching algorithm work its magic.

Find Roommates

So, which is the best Roommate Finder for you?

Finding the most appropriate and suitable roommate for you sounds tiring, but with Roomi, you don’t have to worry! As the best website to find roommates, Roomi ensures your privacy, safety, and it’s really easy to use. Plus, it helps you find roommates and rooms for rent for free. Roomi also makes an effort to improve its services continuously. What more can you ask for from a roommate finder (and more) app? Download the app and sign up today!

Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
